vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Reuben living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.9;
son of: Reuben (H7205);
brother of: Pallu (H6396), Hezron (H2696) and Carmi (H3756)
Group of cha.nokh (חֲנוֹךְ "Hanoch" H2585J)
§ Hanochites = see Hanoch "dedicated"
descendants of Hanoch
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Henoc; tribu de Rubén
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈諾族 这个陽性名詞 種族名稱在希伯來文的意思是 見 哈諾 "獻身的"
哈諾的後裔(民 26:5)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哈诺族 这个阳性名词 种族名称在希伯来文的意思是 见 哈诺 "献身的"
哈诺的后裔(民 26:5)
